shlokas:
ॐ sarveshaan svastirbhavatu । 
sarveshaan shaantirbhavatu । 
sarveshaan purnambhavatu । 
sarveshaan mangalambhavatu । 
Om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥

ॐ sarve bhavantu sukhinah । 
sarve santu niraamayaah । 
sarve bhadraani pashyantu ma kashchidduhkhabhaagbhavet । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥

ॐ asato ma sadgamay । 
tamaso ma jyotirgamay । 
mrtyorma amrtan gamay । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥

ॐ poornamadah poornamidan poornaatpurnamudachyate । 
poornashy poornamaadaay poornamevaavashishyate । 
om shaantih shaantih shaantih ॥
